CustomField.description: Reporting Use 0 = Full Name 1 = First Name 2 = Middle Name 3 = Last Name 4 = Account Name 5 = Phone 6 = Title 7 = Email
CustomField.formula: Contact__r.Contact_Full_Name__c + '|01|' + Contact__r.FirstName + '|02|' + Contact__r.MiddleName + '|03|' + Contact__r.LastName + '|04|' + Contact__r.Account.Name + '|05|' + Contact__r.Phone + '|06|' + Contact__r.Title + '|07|' + Contact__r.Email
CustomField.label: Report Counterparty Contact Fields
